name: V O I D (prototype)
description:
In this game, you must find the way out of the darkness using your mouse to discover the path. Dodge the falls as you get closer to the "Glowy Yellow Square".

WARNING: I'm so sorry but there is a bug that make you unable to jump after a bunch of jumps. I fixed it, but I can't update a new version until the jam is over. I also fixed the level design because it was a little too hard... My bad, I'm so sorry :(
